awd_titl_txt: High Force Micro-Actuator Using TiNi Shape Memory Alloy
awd_abstract_narration: This is a Phase II SBIR research activity. Its                                  goal is to define the processing requirements                                   for combining shape-memory film technology                                      with silicon micro-fabrication.  This will be                                   done by focusing on development of a                                            microvalve.  Questions raised in Phase I will                                   be addressed, structures will be fabricated on                                  silicon and film actuators tested, a valve                                      design test bed will be constructed and a                                       variety of valve configurations examined, and                                   silicon based microvalves will be fabricated                                    over a range of sizes.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Technology, Innovation, and Partnerships
